author: wn.com
title: 24” Main has been flushed, boil water advisory continues (10/18/2015 2:00 PM) (City of Athens ...
text: ( Source : City of Athens and Clarke County, GA ) Repairs on the 24' broken water main in west Athens-Clarke County have been completed and the large main has been flushed. The water quality tests for the large main have come back clean. Water
